Cult Leader.name: Legendary Node
Cult Leader.title: Cult Leader
Cult Leader.description: Your Minions deal x40% increased damage for each x20% of Attack Speed Bonus they have, up to a maximum of 100% Attack Speed Bonus.

Hulking Monstrosity.name: Legendary Node
Hulking Monstrosity.title: Hulking Monstrosity
Hulking Monstrosity.description: Your Golem has x40% increased Maximum Life and deals x100% increased damage.

Flesh-eater.name: Legendary Node
Flesh-eater.title: Flesh-Eater
Flesh-eater.description: Consuming 5 Corpses grants x40% increased damage for 6 seconds.

Scent of Death.name: Legendary Node
Scent of Death.title: Scent of Death
Scent of Death.description: With at least 2 Corpses Nearby, you gain 15% Damage Reduction. With no Corpses Nearby, you deal x15% increased damage.

Bone Graft.name: Legendary Node
Bone Graft.title: Bone Graft
Bone Graft.description: Hitting enemies with Bone Skills increases your damage by x1% and your Maximum Essence by 2 for 8 seconds, stacks up to x8% increased damage and 16 Maximum Essence.

Blood Begets Blood.name: Legendary Node
Blood Begets Blood.title: Blood Begets Blood
Blood Begets Blood.description: Blood Orbs grant x10% increased damage, up to x50%, for 5 seconds.

Wither.name: Rare Node
Wither.title: Gnawing Darkness
effects: 20% Damage to Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies

Wither.name: Magic Node
effects: 3% Damage Reduction from Enemies That Are Shadow DoT

Wither.name: Rare Node
Wither.title: Dragging Shadows
effects: 6% Damage Reduction from Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies

Wither.name: Magic Node
effects: 3% Damage Reduction from Enemies That Are Shadow DoT

Wither.name: Magic Node
effects: 3% Damage Reduction from Enemies That Are Shadow DoT

Wither.name: Legendary Node
Wither.title: Wither
Wither.description: Your Shadow damage over time effects have a x5% chance to deal x50% bonus damage each time they deal damage. This chance is increased by x2% and bonus damage is increased by x8% for each 60 Intelligence you have, up to 1200 Intelligence.

Frailty.name: Legendary Node
Frailty.title: Frailty
Frailty.description: Cursed enemies take x10% increased damage from you and your Minions. This bonus is increased by x10% each second they are Cursed, up to x40%.
